page.title: 02Brahan Seer
page.content: The Brahan Seer is a very important character in this area's history .The Brahan Seer prophecied lots of events that did actually came true.He was blind in one eye but when he looked through the hole in the Brahan Seer's stone using his blind eye he could see into the future.He predicted the Battle of Culloden a century before it happened.Another prophecy was the fall of the House of Seaforth.Every grim detail was predicted by the Brahan Seer.There are some predictons which have not come true yet .He said that an 80 ton boulder in Glenelg one day would fall and kill a man.The Brahan Seer has predicted it will.He said that"Horrid black rains will cause havoc in the Highlands."People say that this is a reference to North Sea Oil.The Brahan Seer's stone was said to have been thrown into Lochussie.
